revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Westell |model=VersaLink 7500 |revision=(A90-750015-07) |asin=B00377I40G |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/21/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U65L006 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=CH87500XX-07 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=GL032M90BFI04 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV160BXEI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-6K |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=10FXxxxxxxxx,11FXxxxxxxxx |default_ssid_regex=^10FX[0-9]{8}$,,,^11FX[0-9]{8}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:23:97,0C:D5:02 |oui_eth=00:23:97,0C:D5:02 }} {{TagLine|Verizon Westell VersaLink 7500}}
*"U65L006", "800215", "GP" is silkscreened on the board. :The default SSID is the serial number. A sample serial number is ''11FX05091328'' :(''11FXxxxxxxxx'' is one likely pattern, some devices may use other variants).
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=65443&start=816 ''Westell VersaLink 7500'' on '''dd-wrt''' forums] :A90-750045-07 is an edition of the 7500 (as opposed to the 7501). :The first 4 digits after A90 specify the board model, the two digits :after that is the market (ISP) the router is being used / distributed by. :Westell isn't specifying what ISP 750045 is for. :So, A90-750045 should be equivalent to the ''Verizon Westell VersaLink'' 7500 :with model A90-750015. Last 2 digits would believe to be the version.
*https://sites.google.com/site/westell7500wirelessrouterwci/
===Westell 7500 Setup for BRIDGE MODE=== {{SCollapse2|Westell 7500 Setup for BRIDGE MODE|{{:Westell VersaLink 7500 (A90-750015-07)/Bridge Mode}}}}
